top.comment: Top navigation bar height on desktop.

sub.comment: Sub navigation bar height on desktop.

mainContentPaddingTop.comment: Padding to account for fixed top and sub nav bars on web.

mobileVisibility.comment: Main navigation hidden on mobile, replaced by toggle.

mobileScrollable.comment: Sub navigation is horizontally scrollable on mobile.

safeArea.comment: Ensures content respects device notches and system bars (managed by framework).

mainContentScroll.comment: Full-screen scroll view for main content.

photoGalleryScroll.comment: Horizontal scrollable container for photo gallery.
